@Dig1taL - the aspect ratio keeps changing because this is the IMAX version. If you saw the film in an IMAX cinema, the action sequences were all in 1:85:1 to make the most of the bigger projection. Even watching this version on a normal TV makes for a better viewing experience. 
Altogether A=10, V=8 - image was a little compromised during the low light scenes, but looked great for the daylight ones. Still, an amazing job for such a long movie with such a small filesize. Good stuff YIFY!!!
